attributes.action: Establish an overseas service scheme for young offenders to enable them to realise how privileged they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With many young people now out of control, prisons filling up and ASBOs being seen as giving 'street cred.'. Would it not be possible to give the option of overseas service, working with depeartely underpriviledged children etc, to young offenders. This would relieve the prison service and, perhaps, give them some sense of how lucky they are. It would not be staright forward, discipline would need to be maintained, but would surely be worth it if it changed some attitudes.
